=== Bug Jams ===

For more information about Bug Jams, check out RunningBugJam.

'''To sign up for <nowiki>[[5-A-Day]]</nowiki> participation, please add your Launchpad ID to the Participants column. (This is not the email address you used for signing up for LP, but the last part of the URL that https://launchpad.net/people/+me redirects you to (everything behind the ~ sign)):

# Click on https://launchpad.net/people/+me
# Look at the URL bar, everything behind the ~ sign is your Launchpad ID.

Just pick a ''tag'': something like `<event>-<date>-<partoftheworlf>` probably works well.

Also sign up here: https://launchpad.net/~5-a-day-participants/+join'''
